dashboard.description: Key Metrics Across All Devices and Services

options.content:
<style type="text/css">
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content {
overflow: hidden;
}
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content iframe {
height:225px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
var weatherProperties = 'lat=55.889068&lon=-3.634458&color=#FFFFFF&text-color=#FFFFFF&units=uk';

// initial load
document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'https://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties;

// refresh
var weatherRefresh = setInterval(function() { document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'https://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties; }, 1800000);

</script>
<iframe id="embedweather" height="100%" src="#" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; width:100%; position:relative; top:-50px; overflow:hidden; margin-bottom: -70px;"></iframe>

eth0 = WAN  
eth1 = NAS  
eth2 = [empty]  
eth3 = Switch  
eth4 = Wifi AP

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /crush/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT last("total") AS "total", last("used") AS "used", last("free") AS "free", last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"
SELECT last("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"
SELECT last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"
SELECT last("Percent_Free_Space")  *-1 + 100 AS "Used - %" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$winhost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"

SELECT (last("Free_Megabytes") / last("Percent_Free_Space") *100) AS "Total - MB" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$winhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

panels.content: eth0 = WAN | eth1 = NAS | eth2 = [Empty] | eth3 = Switch | eth4 = Wifi AP

targets.query: SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "friendly_name",  "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "player_state"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /crush/
list.label: NAS Mountpoints
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /crush/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifName" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /192.168.0.10/
list.label: NAS Network Interface
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifName" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /192.168.0.10/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Windows Hostname
list.name: winhost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"
